meanings.definition: To cross a street unlawfully or without regard for traffic regulations.
meanings.sent1: She decided to jaywalk across the busy street.
meanings.sent2: It is dangerous to jaywalk on a road with fast-moving cars.
meanings.sent3: The chicken joked that it would jaywalk to get to the other side.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior made him jaywalk through life without caution.
meanings.sent5: The image of the daring cat jaywalking stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person who crosses a street unlawfully or without regard for traffic regulations.
meanings.sent1: The jaywalk was fined for crossing the street at the wrong place.
meanings.sent2: Drivers should always watch out for jaywalks on the road.
meanings.sent3: The jaywalk in the funny hat made everyone smile as he crossed the street.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a lost jaywalk in a sea of cars on the busy street.
meanings.sent5: The city was full of colorful jaywalks crossing the roads.
